name: The Inevitable Sinking
description:
HOW TO PLAY: 

 1) CLICK on the enemies to defeat them. 

 2) CLICK on the ship to repair it and delay the sinking. 

 3) Git gud.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

The Captain Sal-Huron, recognized throughout the world, managed to steal the largest treasure in history, but he was greedy and instead of giving a meager coin to the sea as gratitude, he decided to keep it all, provoking the wrath of the gods who condemned to sink along with the treasure he refused to share.

Sal-Huron, like any captain, is proud and stubborn. And he does not plan to abandon his treasure without putting up a good fight, even if it leads to an Inevitable Sinking. He will face the wrath of the god of the sea and his brother, sea creatures, structures that launch projectiles, toilets...? and all sorts of highly unlucky enemies.
